articles.author: Bonz Magsambol
articles.title: Philippines approves Moderna COVID-19 vaccine for emergency use - Rappler
articles.description: The COVID-19 vaccine developed by American drug firm Moderna is the seventh vaccine to be granted emergency use approval in the Philippines
articles.content: Storage of Moderna's vaccine would be more complex compared to other jabs as it requires being frozen in colder temperatures, specifically -25°C to -15°C up to expiration. But unlike the Pfizer vacci… [+199 chars]

articles.author: News18
articles.title: US Congresswoman Writes to Biden Over Covid-19 Situation in India - News18
articles.description: Congresswoman Deborah Ross represents North Carolina, where a sizeable amount of Indian-Americans reside and have expressed concern over the health of family members back in India
articles.content: Expressing concern over a massive surge in COVID-19 cases in India, a Congresswoman has written to US President Joe Biden urging him to accelerate Americas assistance to India in terms of oxygen cyli… [+3517 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: White House wants 70% adults to have first COVID-19 shot by 4 July - Eyewitness News
articles.description: In addition to getting 70% at least partially vaccinated, US President Joe Biden wants '160 million Americans fully vaccinated' by the same date, an official told reporters.
articles.content:
